item.title: PyGrunn Winter Hackathon 2012
item.description: Few days ago, actually, more than one week ago (but I was very busy :) we made our first PyGrunn hackathon. I was lucky and from all the list of ideas, the selected was one of mines! The slides generator, that finally we call hovercraft. Here is a small introduction about what I wanted: A small platform to create slides and have them always associated to a web with this possibilities:
